feature.label: taksan-eclipse-utils.feature
feature.description:
Some useful utilities: - Use CTRL+0 in maven project to create a test for the current open class, or create the class for the current test, or just toggle between the two if they exists
- It is possible to hide stack steps that are filtered
feature.copyright:
This software was developed by Takeuchi and can be used anywhere.
